Sentencas: To determine the effect of grain boundaries and grain orientation on the electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes, a comparison of the in-plane and across-plane ionic conductivity of both strongly and poorly textured, columnar-grained doped ceria thin films was performed within equivalent temperature ranges (150-300 degrees C).
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Additionally, the in-plane conductivity of partially amorphous films, polycrystalline films with randomly oriented grains, and single crystal, epitaxial films with no grain boundaries was determined.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Pulsed laser deposition permitted the growth of all these types of films and the ability to grow columnar-grained doped ceria on both conducting and insulating surfaces enabled testing of the films both in-plane and across-plane.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Compared to the columnar-grained samples, partially amorphous films exhibited a lower conductivity, while epitaxial doped ceria exhibited an enhancement in conductivity of 2 orders of magnitude.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Between 300 and 400 degrees C, the in-plane conductivity of the strongly textured film was higher than the poorly textured one.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: The conductivity and activation energy in-plane and across-plane for the strongly textured film was similar (2.75 x 10(-5) S/cm, 0.70 eV vs. 5.50 x 10(-5) S/cm, 0.68 eV at 250 degrees C).
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: In contrast, for the poorly textured films, the in-plane and across plane conductivity values differed by almost an order of magnitude (2.86 x 10(-5) S/cm, 0.55 eV vs. 1.99 x 10(-4) S/cm, 0.78 eV at 250 degrees C) suggesting that the boundaries between oriented grains were less resistive.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: These results further strengthen the argument that grain orientation affects ionic transport through grain boundaries.
Titulo: Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films
Comparison of the in- and across-plane ionic conductivity of highly oriented neodymium doped ceria thin films
